reviews.review: Я понимаю что теперь нужно покупать игру в виде прайм статуса.. но чтоб и дальше там встречать читеров, это уже бред. Платишь деньги за игру чтоб поиграть с читерами, какой в этом смысл?
puta jogo bom,fez eu ter mts amizades
Very nice and amazing put together game. 10/10 would recommend.
i have played csgo for 6 hours and i suck but im nice and say yes i am also 9 year olds and my mommy do not allow me to play bad gam >:(((((((((((((( but stile good 10/9

There should be admins for cheaters and 128 tick servers...but the game is great.

Year 2020: Still one of the best games!
top zika das galaxia esse jogo

j e b a c te gre
Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei, porém quando a valve liberou o jogo gratuito, mesmo tendo a conta prime ainda cai vom muitos hacker, valve melhore seus anti-xiter, fora isso nada a reclamar!

Neuvěřitelný fakt, že tuto hru hraje tolik hráču doopravdy nechápu. 
-> nefunkční anticheatová ochrana
-> zhoršení odezvy na serverech
-> nefunkční rank systém
-> hrát s cizími hráči je jistá prohra
Lituji všech, kteří strávili tisíce hodin na této prastaré videohře !
To nejhorší je, že i potom co mě zrovna vyhodili frajeři co jsem tahal, tak zase zapnu další kompet a opět začnu nadávat na své spoluhráče nebo nepřátele ...

a po roce lolka jsem to pustil znovu :(((

Jest to bardzo dobra gra dla młodych i starych  gdyż grając w nią udoskonalamy  swoją pamięć , szybkość ruchu , pamięć mięśniową , wzrok , grę zespołową , języki obce i różne zdolności które w życiu są nie zbędne i bardzo przydatne . Odradzam grania w League of Legends .                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                   Serdecznie pozdrawiam Zbigniew

I'am playing CS GO for 3 years. I definitely recommend this game.

Note: CS:GO is like drugs once you start playing csgo you'll hate it but you cant stop playing cuz you'll get addicted !!!
When i just start playing it , it was nice game 
but after playing more than 3000 hours on different account's and 1500 hours on this ,
this game s*ck's 
It's full of cheater's and toxic player's who just want to troll 
It's good to play for fun with 4 of you'r friend but if you all don't care about win or lose
But if it's important go play another game it's not for you
Even if you play face it there is toxic player's or guys who just want to troll you , you  need to be like level 8 or more on face it to get normal guys who want win and will do teamwork and stuff like that 
The anti cheat is trash , valve don't care about that cuz if they ban more account's , they can sell more copy of this trash game
At first i was like spending 150 hours in past 2 weeks and even more but now 0 hours in past 2 weeks
This game got some achievement's that you can not get legally , you need to download some extra map's or use achievement app to get them 
Valve just adding new operation every year to don't let this game die , its like giving water to dead plant to make him alive again but nothing'll happen 
I CAN NOT recommend this game
